trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_TRANSFORMHLX2024_000_000<tab>Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_TRANSFORMHLX2024_000_001<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A1_000_001<tab>A journey to silence the song of oblivion.

TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_TRANSFORMHLX2024_000_002<tab>Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_001<tab>An Elezen man who serves as a respected member of the Forum.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_002<tab>A compassionate Elezen woman determined to give children a brighter future.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_003<tab>A Garlean man determined to restore the broken remains of his homeland.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_004<tab>A Viera man who travels the world in search of esoteric curios.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_100_005<tab>A simulacrum housing the will of a great wyrm who was reunited with his sister in the void.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_150_006<tab>A shy but mathematically minded clone of an inspector extraordinaire.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_007<tab>A Hyuran man who crossed time and space to protect this star.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_008<tab>A Hyuran man who spends his life collecting treasures of the Far East.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_A2_000_009<tab>A Miqo'te woman who shares her body with the soul of an ancient magus.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_TRANSFORMHLX2024_000_004<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The transfiguration can be removed by using the “Unveil” action, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
TEXT_FESHLX2024TRANSFORM3_00859_TRANSFORMHLX2024_000_010<tab>Pay no mind to this little imp! I'm <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> busy during the Wake─I've no time for mundane mummers, no.
